name: Solitaire: Classic Card Puzzle
description:
"Feeling bored? Need a change of gears? Solitaire is a fun, yet challenging way to chill out and get your brain moving, and most importantly, it’s always by your side!

Whether you’ve played Solitaire with actual cards, or one of the many classic variants on PC and mobile, you’re sure to have spent some time looking for that one elusive Jack of Spades, which never seemed to come. It’s always fun to look for a solution to a bad hand and find a way out of a tough jam, and Solitaire by Huuuge lets you do this anywhere you want!

This classic Klondike (or Patience, if you’re from the other side of the pond) Solitaire is a lightweight option that offers cool simple visuals, with customization options that will help you relax in your favorite way. Draw 1 and Draw 3 variants will give you some cool variety and a change in difficulty when you’re feeling up for the challenge.

If you love brain-teasing games then this version of Klondike Solitaire is for you! Install now and experience:


Simple, addicting gameplay.
Clean interface supporting both left and right-handed play.
In-depth stats
Customization options, with various backgrounds, card designs and cardbacks
Hints for when you’re stuck
Auto-complete with a satisfying animation

Install now to enjoy this classic game brought to you!"
